name: antsct-aging-fw
label: FTDC ANTs Cortical Thickness
description: Gear version of the FTDC antsCorticalThickness pipeline for aging populations. Performs 1. Brain extraction  2. Brain n-tissue segmentation  3. Cortical thickness  4. (Optional) registration to a template

bids-filter-file.description: A JSON file describing custom BIDS input filters using PyBIDS. Must contain 't1w' key (note lowercase 't'). See example_filter.json.More info: https://fmriprep.readthedocs.io/en/latest/faq.html#how-do-I-select-only-certain-files-to-be-input-to-fMRIPrep

t1_anatomy.description: T1-weighted anatomical NIfTI file. When provided this file will be used in place of any T1w images found in the current session's BIDS dataset.

mni-labels-1.description: One or more generic label images in the MNI152NLin2009cAsym space, to be warped to the subject space.

mni-labels-2.description: One or more generic label images in the MNI152NLin2009cAsym space, to be warped to the subject space.

mni-labels-3.description: One or more generic label images in the MNI152NLin2009cAsym space, to be warped to the subject space.

mni-cortical-labels-1.description: One or more cortical label images in the MNI152NLin2009cAsym space, to be propagated to the subject's cortical mask. Use this option if the label set contains only cortical labels.

mni-cortical-labels-2.description: One or more cortical label images in the MNI152NLin2009cAsym space, to be propagated to the subject's cortical mask. Use this option if the label set contains only cortical labels.

mni-cortical-labels-3.description: One or more cortical label images in the MNI152NLin2009cAsym space, to be propagated to the subject's cortical mask. Use this option if the label set contains only cortical labels.

BIDS-acq.description: The acq- field of the input image filename. Leave blank if the correct file is distinguishable without an acq- field.

BIDS-run.description: The run- field of the input image filename. Leave blank if there is only one run.

BIDS-session.description: The ses- field of the input image filename. Leave blank if the correct file is distinguishable without a ses- field.

BIDS-subject.description: The sub- field of the input image filename. Leave blank if the correct file is distinguishable without a sub- field.

denoise.description: Run denoising within the ACT pipeline.

num-threads.description: Maximum number of CPU threads to use. Set to 0 to use as many threads as there are cores

run-quick.description: 'true' to use quick registration, 'false' to use the default registration.

trim-neck-mode.description:
mask: sets neck region to 0 
 crop: crops neck region from image 
 none: uses the unaltered input image

author: Tustison, et al. | Modified for Flywheel by Philip Cook, Will Tackett
cite: Tustison NJ, Cook PA, Klein A, Song G, Das SR, Duda JT, Kandel BM, van Strien N, Stone JR, Gee JC, Avants BB. Large-scale evaluation of ANTs and FreeSurfer cortical thickness measurements. Neuroimage. 2014 Oct 1;99:166-79. doi: 10.1016/j.neuroimage.2014.05.044. Epub 2014 May 29. PMID: 24879923.
